Main¶

Command Line Interface¶

The interactive mode provides these commands:

Available Commands¶

Command

Description

generate/gen/g

Generate secure passwords

gui/menu/m

Launch graphical interface

suggest/s/sug

Get password suggestions

cracker/crack/c

Run password cracking tool

exit/quit/q/e/x

Quit the program

Example Usage¶

# From command line:
python main.py

# Then type commands like:
[UMBRA] >> generate
[UMBRA] >> gui

See Also¶

  • AI Password Generator - Password generation documentation

  • Password Suggestion - Password suggestion documentation

  • Password Cracker - Password cracking documentation
